events.text:
[Player’s Name],right? I’m Hunter, your department’s manager. How are you finding the office? We even have a room for recreational activities during break time.

 Back to business though, we need to go over the customer reviews and delete the negative ones.

What? Of course it’s ethical. It’s our job to make sure the product we provide has the best reviews after all. 

For example, here user bigbodonkas46 said: “1 star, f**kin thing broke after one use, you d***b mo******rs”. 

Obviously, we can’t have that. Now following this example, keep deleting reviews.
